TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdamInstance extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer

Docs.summary: The AdamInstance class represents an AD LDS instance server.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The AdamInstance class refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CheckReplicationConsistency() cil managed

Docs.summary: Invokes the Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC) that verifies the replication topology for this AD LDS instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see the topic "DsReplicaConsistencyCheck" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet"> object for this AD LDS instance.
Gets or sets the default partition that this AD LDS instance serves.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains the distinguished name of the default partition that this AD LDS instance serves. If the default partition is not set, this will return `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean"> value that determines if the managed resources should be released. `true` if the managed resources should be released; `false` if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance"> object and, optionally, releases managed resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

Docs.summary: Overrides the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection FindAll (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string partitionName);

.method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection FindAll(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string partitionName) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search. The target of this context must be an AD LDS configuration set.
A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains the name of the partition to search for AD LDS instances.
Docs.summary: Finds all AD LDS instances in the specified context that host the specified partition.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection"> that contains the AD LDS instances that are found by the search.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance FindOne (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string partitionName);

.method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance FindOne(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string partitionName) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search. The target of this context must be an AD LDS configuration set.
A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains the name of the partition to search for an AD LDS instance.
Docs.summary: Finds a single AD LDS instance in the specified context that hosts the specified partition.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance"> object that represents the AD LDS instance that is found by the search.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance GetAdamInstance(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that contains the target and credentials to use to retrieve the object. The target of the context must be an AD LDS instance.
Docs.summary: Returns an AD LDS instance for a specified context.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance"> object that refers to the AD LDS instance that is found.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The GetAdamInstance method refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighborCollection GetAllReplicationNeighbors() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the replication neighbors for this AD LDS instance.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighborCollection"> object that contains the replication neighbors for this AD LDS instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationFailureCollection GetReplicationConnectionFailures() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a list of replication connection failures that are recorded by this AD LDS instance.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationFailureCollection"> object that contains the replication connection failures that are recorded by this AD LDS instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationCursorCollection GetReplicationCursors(string partition) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains the distinguished name of the partition for which to retrieve the replication cursor information.
Docs.summary: Returns the replication cursor information for a specified partition.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationCursorCollection"> object that contains the replication cursor information.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryReplicationMetadata GetReplicationMetadata(string objectPath) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains the path to the Active Directory Domain Services object for which to retrieve the replication metadata.
Docs.summary: Returns the replication metadata for a specific Active Directory Domain Services object.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryReplicationMetadata"> object that contains the replication cursor information.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighborCollection GetReplicationNeighbors(string partition) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains the distinguished name of the partition for which to retrieve the replication neighbors.
Docs.summary: Returns the replication neighbors for a specified partition.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighborCollection"> object that contains the replication neighbors for this AD LDS instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationOperationInformation GetReplicationOperationInformation() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the current and pending replication operations for this AD LDS instance.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationOperationInformation"> object that contains the current and pending replications operations.

Docs.summary: Gets the host name of the computer that hosts this AD LDS instance.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains the computer host name.

Docs.summary: Gets the inbound replication connections for this AD LDS instance.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnectionCollection"> object that contains the inbound replication connections for this AD LDS instance.

Docs.summary: Gets the IP address of the computer that hosts this AD LDS instance.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains the IP address of the computer that hosts this AD LDS instance.

Docs.summary: Gets the LDAP port number of this AD LDS instance.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Int32"> value that contains the LDAP port number of this AD LDS instance.

Docs.summary: Gets the outbound replication connections for this AD LDS instance.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnectionCollection"> object that contains the outbound replication connections for this AD LDS instance.

Docs.summary: Gets the roles that this AD LDS instance holds.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRoleCollection"> object that contains <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole> members that indicate the roles that this AD LDS instance serves.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save() cil managed

Docs.summary: Commits changes to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance"> object to the underlying directory store.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SeizeRoleOwnership(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole role) cil managed

Docs.param: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"> members that specifies which role the AD LDS instance should take ownership of.
Docs.summary: Seizes ownership of the specified role.
Gets the name of the site of which this AD LDS instance is a member.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains the name of the site of which this AD LDS instance is a member.

Docs.summary: Gets the SSL port number of this AD LDS instance.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Int32"> value that contains the SSL port number of this AD LDS instance.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the synchronization delegate for this AD LDS instance.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncUpdateCallback"> delegate that this AD LDS instance will use for synchronization notifications.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void SyncReplicaFromAllServers (string partition, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOptions options);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SyncReplicaFromAllServers(string partition, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOptions options) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains the distinguished name of the partition of the domain controller to synchronize.
A combination of one of more of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOptions"> members.
Docs.summary: Synchronizes the specified partition with all other domain controllers.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void SyncReplicaFromServer (string partition, string sourceServer);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SyncReplicaFromServer(string partition, string sourceServer) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains the distinguished name of the partition to synchronize.
A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains the name of the server with which to synchronize.
Docs.summary: Synchronizes the specified partition with the specified domain controller.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void TransferRoleOwnership(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole role) cil managed

Docs.param: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"> members that specifies which role should be transferred to this AD LDS instance.
Docs.summary: Transfers the specified role to this AD LDS instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void TriggerSyncReplicaFromNeighbors(string partition) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains the distinguished name of the partition to synchronize.
Docs.summary: Begins a synchronization of the specified partition.
